IN THE COURT OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF THE FIRST CLASS- III
THIRUVANANTHAPURAM
Present: Sri. Vinod Babu M.U
Judicial Magistrate of the First Class-III
Friday the 15" day of February, 2025
CG. 1217/2018

Complainant : State represented by the Sub Inspector of Police,
Thampanoor Police Station (Crime No. 1372/18).

(By Asst. Public Prosecutor)

Accused : Alvin, aged 25 years, S/o Antony Joseph, Mavuvila
veedu, Moonnammoodu desom, Vazhottukonam ward,
Vattiyoorkavu village.

Offence : U/s. 27 (b) of NDPS Act.

Order : Accused is convicted and sentenced to pay a fine of
Rs 50/- for the offence U/S.27 (b) of NDPS Act. In
default of payment of fine the accused shall undergo
simple imprisonment for 1 day.

Heard, perused the records and passed the following:
JUDGMENT

1. The accused stands charge sheeted by the Sub Inspector of Police, Thampanoor
Police Station alleging offence U/S. 27 (b) of NDPS Act.

2. Accused pleaded guilty . Particulars of offence U/s. 27 (b) of NDPS Act was read
over and explained to the accused and he pleaded guilty. This court is convinced
that the plea of the accused is voluntary. Hence his plea is accepted. The accused
is found guilty for the offence U/S. 27 (b) of NDPS Act and he is convicted
thereunder.

2
3. Accused is convicted and sentenced to pay a fine of Rs. 50/- for the
offence U/S.27 (b) of NDPS Act. In default of payment of fine the
accused shall undergo simple imprisonment for 1 day.

(Dictated to the Confidential Assistant, transcribed and typed by her, corrected and

pronounced by me, in open court, on this the 15" day of February, 2025.)
Judicial Magistrate of the First Class- ITI
Thiruvananthapuram
